summary: A man with an asthmatic voice telephones and assaults clerk Kelly Sherwood at home and coerces her into helping him steal a large sum from her bank.
cast: Glenn Ford|Lee Remick|Stefanie Powers|Roy Poole|Ned Glass|Anita Loo|Patricia Huston|Gilbert Green|Clifton James|Al Avalon|William Bryant|Dick Crockett|James Lanphier|Ross Martin|Joanne Bahris|James T. Callahan|Bob Carraher|Mario Cimino|Fred Coby|Robert Coffey|Barbara Collentine|Bob Dempsey|George DeNormand|Frederic Downs|Don Drysdale|Harvey Evans|Mike Foran|Harold Goodwin|Claire Griswold|Warren Hsieh|Kenny Jackson|Helen Jay|Ray Kellogg|Tommy Lee|Clarence Lung|Mari Lynn|Edward Mallory|Kelly McCormick|Fay McKenzie|Sidney Miller|Wally Moon|George Moorman|Judee Morton|Bill Neff|Karen Norris|Richard Norris|Sherry O'Neil|Peggy Patten|Gil Perkins|Mary Ellen Popel|William Remick|John Roseboro|Vin Scully|William Sharon|Bert Stevens|Audrey Swanson|David Tomack|Ken Wales|Russ Whiteman|Beal Wong
title: Chantaje contra una mujer
